Welcome to PySTL's documentation!
=================================

.. image:: \_static\\pystl_readme_cover.PNG
  :width: 400
  :alt: Alternative text

**PySTL** is a python library to create simple geometries and shapes. PySTL gives the user the ability to:

* create simple geometries and shapes pythonically.
* visualize them using matplotlib or pyvista backend
* export them in a .stl format.


.. Note::
   The project is still under development and welcomes feedback and contributions from users and people from
   diverse background and knowledge. Please contact *sumanan047@gmail.com* to get included.

.. automodule:: PySTL
   :members:

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
